meanings.definition: The state of lacking a sense of place or belonging.
meanings.sent1: The placelessness of the new city made her feel lost and alone.
meanings.sent2: The feeling of placelessness in the unfamiliar town was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: His constant forgetfulness created a comical sense of placelessness in his daily routine.
meanings.sent4: The placelessness of the empty room echoed with a haunting emptiness.
meanings.sent5: The placelessness of the vast desert stretched out endlessly before them.

meanings.definition: The quality of being without a specific location or identity.
meanings.sent1: The placelessness of the nomadic tribe made it hard to track their movements.
meanings.sent2: The placelessness of the ghostly figure added to its mysterious aura.
meanings.sent3: The missing puzzle piece left a sense of placelessness in the completed picture.
meanings.sent4: The placelessness of the fog obscured the familiar landmarks.
meanings.sent5: The placelessness of the lost key left them locked out of the house.
